meanings.definition: Clothing made from denim fabric, typically consisting of a jacket and pants.
meanings.sent1: I love my new jeanswear; it's so comfortable and stylish.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new set of jeanswear for the upcoming trip.
meanings.sent3: The jeanswear walked into the party, looking cool and confident.
meanings.sent4: Her jeanswear was like a shield, protecting her from the chilly wind.
meanings.sent5: The jeanswear on display caught everyone's attention with its unique design.

meanings.definition: To wear jeans or denim clothing.
meanings.sent1: I jeanswear every day because it's my favorite outfit.
meanings.sent2: He jeanswears to work on casual Fridays.
meanings.sent3: She jeanswears even when the dress code is business casual.
meanings.sent4: They jeanswear proudly, embracing their individual style.
meanings.sent5: We jeanswear confidently, knowing our denim choice reflects our personality.
